## RumInitConfiguration.startSessionReplayRecordingManually property

If the session is sampled for Session Replay, only start the recording when `startSessionReplayRecording()` is called, instead of at the beginning of the session. Default: if startSessionReplayRecording is 0, true; otherwise, false. See \[Session Replay Usage\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/real\_user\_monitoring/session\_replay/browser/\#usage) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
startSessionReplayRecordingManually?: boolean | undefined;
```
